Bash(PGPASSWORD=Xe05Klm563kkjL psql -h aws-1-eu-north-1.pooler.supabase.com -p 6543 -U postgres.lhsnmjgdtjalfcsurxvg -d postgres -c "
SELECT column_name, data_type, is_nullable 
FROM information_schema.columns

Bash(PGPASSWORD=Xe05Klm563kkjL psql -h aws-1-eu-north-1.pooler.supabase.com -p 6543 -U postgres.lhsnmjgdtjalfcsurxvg -d postgres -c "
SELECT table_schema, table_name, column_name, data_type 
FROM information_schema.columns 
WHERE table_schema = ''app'' 
AND table_name IN (''methodology_plans'', ''methodology_exercise_sessions'', ''historico_ejercicios'', ''progreso_usuario'')
ORDER BY table_name, ordinal_position;
")

Bash(PGPASSWORD=Xe05Klm563kkjL psql -h aws-1-eu-north-1.pooler.supabase.com -p 6543 -U postgres.lhsnmjgdtjalfcsurxvg -d postgres -c "
SELECT table_schema, table_name, column_name, data_type, is_nullable
FROM information_schema.columns 
WHERE table_schema = ''app'' 
AND table_name IN (''methodology_exercise_sessions'', ''methodology_plans'', ''historico_ejercicios'')
ORDER BY table_name, ordinal_position;
")

Bash(PGPASSWORD=Xe05Klm563kkjL psql -h aws-0-eu-north-1.pooler.supabase.com -p 6543 -U postgres.lhsnmjgdtjalfcsurxvg -d postgres -c "
SELECT 
  mes.session_id,
  mes.user_id,
  mes.methodology_plan_id,
  mes.day_name,
  mes.status,
  mes.session_started_at,
  mes.warmup_time_seconds,
  COUNT(mee.exercise_order) as total_exercises
FROM app.methodology_exercise_sessions mes
LEFT JOIN app.methodology_exercise_entries mee ON mes.session_id = mee.session_id
WHERE mes.user_id = 19 
  AND mes.methodology_plan_id = 30
GROUP BY mes.session_id, mes.user_id, mes.methodology_plan_id, mes.day_name, mes.status, mes.session_started_at, mes.warmup_time_seconds
ORDER BY mes.session_id DESC
LIMIT 5;
")

Bash(PGPASSWORD=Xe05Klm563kkjL psql -h aws-0-eu-north-1.pooler.supabase.com -p 6543 -U postgres.lhsnmjgdtjalfcsurxvg -d postgres -c "
SELECT 
  mep.exercise_order,
  mep.status,
  mep.series_completed,
  mep.time_spent_seconds,
  mep.completed_at,
  me.exercise_name
FROM app.methodology_exercise_progress mep
JOIN app.methodology_exercises me ON mep.methodology_exercise_id = me.id
WHERE mep.methodology_session_id = 29
ORDER BY mep.exercise_order;
")
